title: natcatnhanh's art page
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

Hi I'm Nat Cat. A fanartist, who really really likes SCP. I love everything about the concepts and website. 

About me: Sometime in 2019, I came across SCP through [https://www.pixiv.net/user/18923/series/10631 松(A・TYPEcorp.)] and their [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H3jjv0wpZJg&list=PL8fm_MTq3WfU7AlpGkU3W44R_WO3cY_7N Oversimplified SCP] series that was posted onto Youtube. I've been a huge fan of it ever since, and I adore TYPEcorp's art. I automatically consider the majority of their designs as canon and draw them accordingly in my work keke

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-978-extended-test-logs Desire Camera is my favorite SCP], it's very beautiful and heartfelt. The epitome of everything I like about the SCP website and all things relating to it.  

I like cosmic horror, and horror that still centers around themes of humanity. 

One of my favorite quotes that I associate with SCP is: "I believe in a universe that dosen't care and people who do" from the 2017 video game; Night In The Woods 

https://www.tumblr.com/natcatnhanh

= ₊⊹♡

+ //Here is some of my art though// 
//[ w/ artist commentary, and dates ⊹☽ ]//

> 
> art for Worktober day three, Foundation Medical Examiners! When foundation employees die, there has to also be some type of personal to examine their cause of death. Oct 12. 2024

[[collapsible show="Abel, or uhmm Able*" hide="awe"]]

[[image https://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/natcatnhanh-sandbox/one%20of%20the%20first%20ever%20major%20pieces%20about%20SCP]]
> 
> Abel, or uhmm Able* This is one of my first ever major artworks about SCP. I remember reuploading it on my tumblr like 7 different times because I wanted everything to look perfect. I still like this piece even though my style has changed, my personal favorite details is the sheeps; looking directly at the camera. April 22. 2024

[[/collapsible]]

> He's actually supposed to be portrayed as younger in this drawing,
